text: make your mark on the world my name is
amaya alexander i'm 13 years old and i
own the one and only dance studio on
wheels
i teach in detroit in the areas where
kids can't afford shoes
the main purpose is to reach out to the
kids who don't have the opportunities
that i have because maybe they're really
really good dancers but their parents
can't afford to get them into classes or
their parents don't have enough money to
drive them somewhere i would bring my
studio to them crisscross one two three
i want to reach out to discover those
talents and help them discover like what
they really have and their potential
good job well today we're gonna go to
the boys and girls club where i
volunteer and they haven't seen the bus
because i usually teach inside but i
think when they finally see it they're
going to be really excited and amazed
and everything
i was just surprised i've never seen a
pink bus before i really want to impact
their lives
yes i see my boss as like the little
spark that can start in them and hope
that makes them
realize that maybe one day they can do
something greater than their
circumstances and they can break free
from what they're living in now and like
how i did one two three four it's a lot
of fun because you get to learn things
that you really couldn't before amaya is
like a role model to me i like to do
every single thing like her knowing that
some of the girls here look up to me
makes me feel really good because it
lets me know that i'm doing something
right
